content.text:
# List of wars involving Suriname

This is a list of wars and conflicts involving Dutch Guiana and later Suriname from the Dutch colonisation of the Guianas to the present day.
{| class="wikitable"
|-

! style="background:#b3c491" rowspan="1" width=150px| Combatant 1
! style="background:#b3c491" rowspan="1" width=160px| Combatant 2
! style="background:#b3c491" rowspan="1" width=300px| Results
|-

|style="background:#efefef"|  Desi Bouterse

*Overthrow of the Prime Minister with a violent coup.

|style="background:#efefef"|
